message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of meeting in the middle. How about $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to meet you at $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about we meet at $11500?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still looking for a better deal. How about we meet at $10000? I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.
I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not budging further. This is my final offer.
